You can still download torrent files from piratebay. Here is the trick:
1) At the end of the URL of the torrent add:  ".torrent"
2) Then after "http://" and before "thepiratebay" write "torrents."
3) Delete the word "/torrent" in the middle of the URL (after "piratebay.se" and before the number)
